mapper.select:
select
distinct
from c_print
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') uuid from dual
insert into c_print (id, sbid, dysj, dyys) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dyys,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select replace(uuid(),'-','') uuid from dual
insert into c_print
id,
sbid,
dysj,
dyys,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dyys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update c_print
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sbid = #{record.sbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dysj = #{record.dysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dyys = #{record.dyys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update c_print set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sbid = #{record.sbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dysj = #{record.dysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dyys = #{record.dyys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_print
sbid = #{sbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dysj = #{dysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dyys = #{dyys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select d.cname sbid,a.realname,c.name,t.dyys,t.dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_user a on t.user_id=a.kh LEFT JOIN sys_department_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department c on b.department_id=c.id LEFT JOIN c_device d on d.id=t.sbid where 1=1
and d.cname like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
and a.realname like concat('%',#{username},'%')

select b.department_id,c.name,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,10) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_user a on t.user_id=a.kh LEFT JOIN sys_department_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department c on b.department_id=c.id where 1=1
and b.department_id = #{name}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY b.department_id,c.name,left(t.dysj,10)

select a.cname,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,10) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_device a on a.id=t.sbid where 1=1
and a.cname = #{name}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY a.cname,left(t.dysj,10)

select c.name,a.username,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,10) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_user a on t.user_id=a.kh LEFT JOIN sys_department_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department c on b.department_id=c.id where 1=1
and b.department_id = #{depid}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY c.name,a.username,left(t.dysj,10)

select b.department_id,c.name,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,7) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_user a on t.user_id=a.kh LEFT JOIN sys_department_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department c on b.department_id=c.id where 1=1
and b.department_id = #{name}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY b.department_id,c.name,left(t.dysj,7)

select a.cname,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,7) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_device a on a.id=t.sbid where 1=1
and a.cname = #{name}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY a.cname,left(t.dysj,7)

select c.name,a.username,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,7) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_user a on t.user_id=a.kh LEFT JOIN sys_department_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department c on b.department_id=c.id where 1=1
and b.department_id = #{depid}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY c.name,a.username,left(t.dysj,7)

select b.department_id,c.name,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,4) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_user a on t.user_id=a.kh LEFT JOIN sys_department_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department c on b.department_id=c.id where 1=1
and b.department_id = #{name}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY b.department_id,c.name,left(t.dysj,4)

select a.cname,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,4) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_device a on a.id=t.sbid where 1=1
and a.cname = #{name}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY a.cname,left(t.dysj,4)

select c.name,a.username,count(*) dycs,sum(t.dyys) dyys,left(t.dysj,4) dysj from c_print t LEFT JOIN c_user a on t.user_id=a.kh LEFT JOIN sys_department_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department c on b.department_id=c.id where 1=1
and b.department_id = #{depid}
and t.dysj like concat('%',#{sj},'%')
GROUP BY c.name,a.username,left(t.dysj,4)
